header.descripcion: Web developer passionate about technology and programming

1.descripcion:
My name is Carles, I am 28 years old and I live near Barcelona. Currently, I work as a frontend developer at Promo-soft, a company specialized in technological solutions for call centers .

I am passionate about working on the creation of aesthetic and functional solutions that improve the user experience.

2.descripcion:
I started my academic training with a CFGM in Microcomputer Systems and Networks (SMX), followed by the CFGS in Multiplatform Application Development (DAM). Then, I decided to focus on frontend development and took a specialized course in Frontend Developer at the UAB.

Despite this, much of my knowledge was acquired self-taught while working as a developer.

3.descripcion:
For the last 6 years, I have been in the role of the only frontend developer in our company, which has given me the opportunity to be responsible for each of the projects I have worked on.

This experience has been essential for my professional growth and development, as it has allowed me to face challenges and learn from my own mistakes.

4.descripcion: One of my main objectives is to continue growing in my professional career, which implies continuing to learn and update my knowledge in the field of frontend development. I would like to continue expanding my skills and gain experience in other related areas such as mobile app development.

1.descripcion: The commitment, loyalty and honesty are my values ​​and principles thanks to the education obtained.

2.descripcion: I understand the needs of the group and I accept the proposed changes in order to improve and advance.

3.descripcion: Technology advances very quickly and I always live with the concern of learning more skills to improve.

4.descripcion: As a frontend developer I have acquired some ability to identify UI needs that clients may have.

5.descripcion: Resilience is something to look after. Looking for alternatives and resolving conflicts under pressure.

6.descripcion: Work as a team and share knowledge to advance and prosper both inside and outside the workplace.
